items.title: New research reveals how everyday cues secretly shape your habits
bullets: ‚Ä¢ A shift in a key brain protein can accelerate habit formation by amplifying dopamine-driven learning signals
‚Ä¢ When this protein drops, dopamine neurons fire more intensely, strengthening new associations in ways that resemble how addictive behaviors take hold
‚Ä¢ This process helps determine whether the brain responds to signals that lead to positive behaviors or ignores cues tied to harmful habits
